body: one day i'll run through all of these in one go after not masturbating for a month. it will be glorious.

It's safe to say, that at least for me, that's one of the best parody hentai series out there. The art isn't perfect and doesn't ressemble the original very much, wherever it's quite charming in its own way, and it does a got job in creating cute and sexy characters and capturing their original charms. The relationships in between characters is great, the work really does a good job in exploring their personalities and desires, also it's cool to see how the work, much like the original work, does little changes on Rito to adequate him to each of the girls. The sex scenes are super hots and the authors really know how those should work, it's not just two bodies colliding, but also the union of two people, and this hentai does exactly that, every time the characters personality affecrs their sex scenes. I hope that we can see more of this wonderful author in the future
It's Momo time, baby! Finally we have a new chapter, which one of the best girls, getting to be embraced by her loved one
Finally in this alternative setting doujin series momo got what she want. 😆
I asked someone to translate the atogaki and it said Kasukabe Taro will continue this series. I'm guessing Kasukabe Taro will do 2nd cour of the series or something.
